name: Snaked
description:
Get the game for Android to play online and compete for high scores: Snaked - Google Play

Kill enemies to recover your rapidly depleting health before you die.

Control the snake with WASD or arrow keys. You can also control using the mouse by swiping in the direction you want to go.

Collect the yellow powerup for health, the green powerup to increase length and the red powerup to increase speed.

Trace a square around enemies to kill them, recover health and increase your score. Kill multiple enemies at the same time to receive bonus health and score.

Squares created by you will do damage as you move through them, but they will also be cleared from the board.
